<<<<<<< HEAD
A Letter from a dissenter to the divines of the Church of England in order to a union
4 p.
Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, London : 1687.
Authorship uncertain; has been ascribed to John Gother. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Imprint partially false; probable publisher Henry Hills. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
